I'm a tenure-track Assistant Professor of Data Science and, by courtesy, Computer Science at the University of Virginia. I also have appointments in UVA's Comprehensive Cancer Center and National Security & Data Policy Institute. Before joining UVA in Fall 2023, I was a postdoc at MIT CSAIL working with Marzyeh Ghassemi. I received my PhD in Data Science from WPI where I was advised by Elke Rundensteiner and Xiangnan Kong.ResearchMy research group works on machine learning and natural language processing.
